original_title: Billy Joe Shaver: Live from Luckenbach
overview: Live DVD from the veteran Country performer. Billy Joe Shaver is one rough 'n' rowdy Texan who's experienced more than enough joy and pain in his 70 years to ever have to go begging for material. This performance catches Shaver at his best, performing 16 tracks as only he can. Features 'Georgia On A Fast Train', 'You Wouldn't Know Love', 'Song For Eddy' and more.
title: Billy Joe Shaver: Live from Luckenbach
